title: Fascination & flexibility / Non-verbal hypnosis
description:
With non-verbal hypnosis we can increase our flexibility, using only the power of the gaze - the technique of Fascination. This woman is a student of Dr. Paret, that participated in his recent non-verbal hypnosis masterclass in Russia. She didn't know that she can bend so much, but being fascinated by Dr. Paret's gaze made her more flexible without even trying. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
